Asphodel was the daughter of [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Mirabella Took]]. She married [[Rufus Burrows]], and their child, [[Milo Burrows]], was born in {{SR
[[Asphodel]] is a plant of the lily family with white, yellow or pink flowers.
